comments:
Build ID: I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
1. choose any uml model file and open it, navigate to any element inside UML Editor
2. Go to menu and choose UML Editor -> Convert To -> Ecore model
3. nothing appears and exception in reported in the log file


More information:
It seems that EMFPlugin requires resource string "_UI_DerivedFeatures_label" which is missing. 

Complete exception report below:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-04-28 17:56:59.566
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
!STACK 0

I don't recognize the build identifier you've referenced... in any case, I could not reproduce this problem with the latest build.
